inlineContent.text: HceCall is the main class that provides ‘shared,’ a singleton property.
HceCall requires a valid user token to be initialized.
Users can join or leave a room with a valid room ID.

abstract.text: class HceCall

SDK Errors
Captures the Remote Video Frame.
Capturing a Video Frame is a synchronous task and could affect the SDK performance during capturing.
Disables the local Audio capturer.
Status of network quality for sending and receiving media.
It is determined using various network metrics including but not limited to bandwidth, packet loss.
The determined rating is based on the media profile/config set by the user. Therefore degradation in media quality due to network problems does not improve the determined rating itself.
Registers the new userToken to the SDK.
Only a valid userToken will be reflected in the SDK when registered.
The registered userToken can be used after initialization.

Configures the processor of the user who implemented the HceVideoProcessorType.
The frame can be modified by defining the process function through the process function within the configured HceVideoProcessorType.
The returned CVPixelBuffer is drawn to the screen and then sent to the remote.
Since the HceVideoProcessorType is strongly referenced inside the SDK, removeVideoProcessor must be called after use.
